hadiths.text: Jabir bin 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah said:'For that which is watered by the sky, rivers and springs, one-tenth. For whatever is irrigated by animals, one-half of one-tenth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُوجِبُ الْعُشْرَ وَمَا يُوجِبُ نِصْفَ الْعُشْرِ
chapter.eng-name: On What One-Tenth Is Due, And on What One-Half Of One-Tenth Is Due
